# Project Section

At the root level of a project file, you define overall project settings.  
The following properties are available:

- `"name"`: A string value representing the name of the report.
- `"watermark"`: Defines a watermark to add to each page. \
  Available options:
  - `"label"`: The text to display across pages.
  - `"color"`: The watermark color (name or hex value).
- `"print"`: Settings controlling print layout and paper size. \
  Available options:
  - `"orientation"`: The page orientation (`"landscape"` or `"portrait"`).
  - `"paper-size"`: The target paper size.  
    See the grouped lists below for all supported constants.

---

## Paper Sizes

### **North American Sizes** {-}
| Identifier | Dimensions |
|-------------|-------------|
| `"paper-letter"` | Letter — 8.5 × 11 in |
| `"paper-legal"` | Legal — 8.5 × 14 in |
| `"paper-tabloid"` | Tabloid — 11 × 17 in |
| `"paper-ledger"` | Ledger — 17 × 11 in |
| `"paper-executive"` | Executive — 7.25 × 10.5 in |
| `"paper-statement"` | Statement — 5.5 × 8.5 in |
| `"paper-folio"` | Folio — 8.5 × 13 in |
| `"paper-note"` | Note — 8.5 × 11 in |
| `"paper-letter-extra"` | Letter Extra — 9.27 × 12 in |
| `"paper-legal-extra"` | Legal Extra — 9.27 × 15 in |

---

### Examples {-}

```json
{
  "name": "RETENTION",
  "print": {
    "orientation": "landscape",
    "paper-size": "paper-a4"
  }
}
```

Boilerplate project containing pages and rows of items:

```json
{
  "name": "RETENTION",
  "pages": [
    {
      "rows": [
        {
          "items": [
            {
            ...
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
